channel.title: Im chinese and i want to make my private server.Any help me,please~
channel.description: 我是中国的java程序员， 想做个runescape私服，并借此提高一下自己的技术。但是没玩过这个游戏，发现全是英文的，希望和你们成为朋友。帮我一下。 im a java programmer,my englist is poor ,and want to make a private server.This game's language is english ,so many difficult.i need some help. Thank you. my msn:lzfeel@hotmail.com

item.title: Im chinese and i want to make my private server.Any help me,please~
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:6, topic:421511”]Look at threads in the Development teams section for ideas.

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

You cannot pay anyone or ‘request’ a coder, but if you put effort into a team post you will probably get a few nibbles.[/quote]

I’ll also say this is an English-only forum. Feel free to use Google translate like suggested earlier.

Offtopic - I had to delete 22 out of 25 replies in this thread because they were spam or racist. I think that’s saying something.

Read full topic

item.title: Im chinese and i want to make my private server.Any help me,please~

Use google translate, because Im not really good at reading a bunch of pixie sticks formed as a word, not to be offensive.

item.title: Im chinese and i want to make my private server.Any help me,please~
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

I don’t think many people out there speak Chinese and play RuneScape private servers.
http://www.google.com/translate works well, translate your Chinese to English, ‘how can you kidding me’ really doesn’t make much sense.

Also, no requests on these forums (I’m assuming its a request because your asking for something). If its not a request, then this is the wrong section.

Read full topic
